title.value: Delete data on hard using Parted Magic

body.value:
To delete data on hard-discs of donated laptops is an essential part of Labdoo concept. Therefore please delete former data after booting the Parted Magic iso as follows:
Delete either in the terminal Click in the task bar at the bottom of the screen at the black terminal icon, a terminal window will open. Please type sudo shred /dev/sda -f -v (Enter). This command writes 3 times random numbers on the hard drive and thus deletes all old data. Note: In rare cases using very old hard drives please enter, if SDA is not accepted: hda instead of sda . If necessary, even adjust the keyboard layout to the layout of the donated laptop (in Keyboard Layout)
or use the tool Disc Eraser on the Parted Magic Desktop Double click the the icon (red eraser Disc Eraser) and follow the instructions.
The deletion can take several hours.
